TEXT.TITLE: INTEGRATED <IGNG> FIELD TRIALS APPROVED
TEXT.BODY:
Integrated Genetics Inc said the Food and Drug Administration approved field trials of a hormone which is essential to the regulation of cows' reproduction. Integrated said field trials will begin immediately under the direction of Granada Corp's Granada R and D Ventures, Integrated's partner in this area.
Reuter
